values: Does God Intend Evil for Our Good? Providential Peril for Joseph, Jesus, and YouDoes God Intend Evil for Our Good? Providential Peril for Joseph, Jesus, and You

What sinners and Satan intend for evil, God always superintends for good. Our all-wise God brings restoration from ruin and deliverance out of danger.What sinners and Satan intend for evil, God always superintends for good. Our all-wise God brings restoration from ruin and deliverance out of danger.
